mapper.select: select i_name, i_num from island where i_name LIKE '%'||#{searchData}||'%'

SELECT rnum,i_num ,TRIM(i_name) AS i_name, i_controlnum, i_jibeon, i_distance, i_distanceex, i_islandmanage FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY i_num ASC) AS rnum, i_num, TRIM(i_name) as i_name, i_controlnum, i_jibeon, i_distance, i_distanceex, i_islandmanage FROM island) ORDER BY rnum DESC
